reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

My approach will be:
1. First, explore the repository structure
2. Check the current Maven configuration (pom.xml files)
3. Update the Java version in pom.xml files
4. Check for any deprecated APIs or incompatibilities
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to test
6. Fix any issues that arise

        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>

                        <compilerVersion>${jdk}</compilerVersion>

                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>

                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>2.22.2</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <argLine>@{argLine} -Xms1024m -Xmx2048m</argLine>
                        <reuseForks>true</reuseForks>

                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>

                    <version>3.1.0</version>
                    <inherited>true</inherited>
                    <dependencies>

                        <dependency>
                            <groupId>com.puppycrawl.tools</groupId>
                            <artifactId>checkstyle</artifactId>
                            <version>8.29</version>
                        </dependency>
                    </dependencies>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <phase>process-sources</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>check</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                    <configuration>
                        <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
                        <consoleOutput>true</consoleOutput>
                        <linkXRef>false</linkXRef>
                        <failOnViolation>true</failOnViolation>
                        <excludes>**/generated-sources/**/*,**/generated-test-sources/**/*</excludes>
                        <sourceDirectories>
                            <sourceDirectory>${project.build.sourceDirectory}</sourceDirectory>
                        </sourceDirectories>
                        <includeTestSourceDirectory>true</includeTestSourceDirectory>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.1.0</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>jar</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                    <version>0.8.4</version>
                    <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                        <execution>
                            <id>report</id>
                            <phase>test</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>report</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.sonatype.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>nexus-staging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>1.6.8</version>
                    <extensions>true</extensions>
                    <configuration>
                        <serverId>ossrh-snapshots-ripple</serverId>
                        <nexusUrl>https://oss.sonatype.org/</nexusUrl>
                        <autoReleaseAfterClose>true</autoReleaseAfterClose>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
                    <artifactId>license-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>1.20</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <!--license to use for the project-->
                        <licenseName>mit</licenseName>
                        <processStartTag>========================LICENSE_START=================================
                        </processStartTag>
                        <processEndTag>=========================LICENSE_END==================================
                        </processEndTag>

                        <!--generate license file even if it exists-->
                        <force>true</force>

                        <!--exclude test-scoped dependencies from the 3rd party license-list-->
                        <excludedScopes>test</excludedScopes>

                        <excludes>
                            <exclude>**/*.json</exclude>
                        </excludes>

                    </configuration>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>license-management</id>
                            <goals>
                                <!--updates the source's headers according to the specified license-->
                                <goal>update-file-header</goal>

                                <!--Adds the full-blown license file to the final product-->
                                <goal>update-project-license</goal>

                                <!--generate and add a list of third-party licenses-->
                                <goal>add-third-party</goal>
                            </goals>
                            <phase>process-sources</phase>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>

            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

    <reporting>
        <plugins>

                    </reportSet>
                </reportSets>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                <configuration>
                    <excludes>
                        <exclude>**/generated-sources/**/*,**/generated-test-sources/**/*</exclude>
                    </excludes>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </reporting>

    <distributionManagement>

            <id>ossrh-snapshots-interledger</id>
            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots</url>
        </snapshotRepository>
    </distributionManagement>

Good progress! The JaCoCo issue is fixed. Now we have an issue with Spring CGLIB not being able to access internal Java classes due to Java 17's module system restrictions. The error is:

```
java.lang.reflect.InaccessibleObjectException: Unable to make protected final java.lang.Class java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(...) accessible: module java.base does not "opens java.lang" to unnamed module
```

This is a common issue when running older Spring versions on Java 17. We need to either:
1. Upgrade Spring to a version that supports Java 17 (Spring 5.3+ or Spring Framework 6+)
2. Add JVM arguments to open the required modules

The following changes were made to migrate the ripple-topology project from Java 8 to Java 17:

### 1. **Updated Java Version in Main POM** (`/tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/ripple-topology/pom.xml`):

### 3. **Updated JaCoCo Plugin**:

### 4. **Updated Spring Framework**:

### 5. **Added javax.annotation-api Dependency** (`/tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/ripple-topology/ripple-topology-ui/pom.xml`):
